configdir.name: Config Dir: Store Custom Songs + Edit Song Blacklist
configdir.description:
<cy>(Hopefully.)</c>
This setting does literally nothing new except being a button that acts as a shortcut to open the config directory for this mod (which is kind of important for using this mod properly, because this is where you will store menu loops), because the legendary developers in the Geode Team themselves forgot to add a shortcut button that would have done this exact same thing, and I have gotten far too many folks (rightfully) asking me to find the config directory when using some of my other mods, and I hate repeating the same things over and over again, and I don't know if the next major update for Geode will also repeat this mistake where HJfod forgets to include a config directory shortcut button, so this setting and this button are here for extra insurance, so please enjoy this extra button, I guess. Anyway, by the time you're finished reading this, your device should be finished with opening the config directory; press "Aight" to close this window.

useCustomSongs.name: Use Custom Songs Instead
useCustomSongs.description:
Use your own songs instead of those you have downloaded from Newgrounds or RobTop's Music Library.

<cy>Find instructions in the mod info popup.</c>

playlistMode.name: Playlist Mode
playlistMode.description:
<cl>Original idea by TheKevinner.</c>

Change menu loops after a song is finished. Requires more than 1 song available to work.
playlistMode.longerDescription:
<cl>Original idea by TheKevinner.</c>

Change menu loops after a song is finished. Requires more than 1 song available to work.

<cr>This feature is ***very*** unstable. It's best if you restart your game after toggling this setting.</c>

<cy>Known issues (usually for non-Windows users):</c>
<cy>- Songs may stop changing while/after viewing Geode UI, the Tower, the icon kit, or the shops.</c>
<cy>- Playlist Mode disables loops from the Tower, all shops, and all vaults. (Not much of a loss; those loops get tiring after a while.)</c>
<cy>- Playlist Mode may break when there is only one song for the mod to choose from.

saveSongOnGameClose.name: Remember Last Menu Loop
saveSongOnGameClose.description:
<cl>Original idea by HexCodesGMD.</c>

If enabled, this mod's most recently chosen menu loop will be the first loop you hear the next time you open Geometry Dash.

enableCopySongID.name: "Copy Song ID" Button
enableCopySongID.description:
<cl>Original idea by Akashnil. Original sprite by hiimjustin000.</c>

Enables the <cj>copy Song ID</c> in the main menu.

<cy>If</c> <cl>"Use Custom Songs Instead"</c> <cy>is enabled, this button will copy the song name instead.</c>

enableShuffleButton.name: Shuffle Button
enableShuffleButton.description:
Enables the <cj>shuffle button</c> in the main menu.

<cy>Using this button is not the same feature as enabling</c> <cl>"Playlist Mode"</c><cy>, although it *can* work with</c> <cl>"Playlist Mode"</c> <cy>enabled. This button only changes the menu loop to a different song *when pressed*, instead of when a song finishes.</c>

enableBlacklistButton.name: Blacklist Button
enableBlacklistButton.description:
<cl>Original idea by AlphaQuata.</c>

Enables the <cj>blacklist button</c> in the main menu.

<cy>Using this button prevents a song from being chosen as a menu loop, and chooses a new menu loop song.</c>

enableFavoriteButton.name: Favorite Button
enableFavoriteButton.description:
<cl>Original idea by AlphaQuata.</c>

Enables the <cj>favorite button</c> in the main menu.

<cy>Using this button increases the chance a song will be chosen as a menu loop.</c>

enableHoldSongButton.name: Hold Song Button (READ!)
enableHoldSongButton.description:
Enables the <cj>"Hold Song" button</c> in the main menu.

<cy>Like Tetris, using this button holds onto the name of the current song, and swaps menu loop songs with a previously held song (if there is one).</c>

enablePreviousButton.name: Previous Song Button (READ!)
enablePreviousButton.description:
<cl>Original idea by DurexSensitive.</c>

Go back <c_>one</c> song. This does <c_>NOT</c> store your entire menu loop history, only one song at a time.

Don't expect this intentional limitation to go away anytime soon.

enableNotification.name: "Now Playing" Notifs
enableNotification.description: Shows a notification with the name of the currently playing song.

enableNewNotification.name: Notifs: New Notif Button
enableNewNotification.description: Enables the <cj>notification regeneration button</c> in the main menu.

removeSuffix.name: Notifs: Hide File Extension
removeSuffix.description:
Hides the file extension of the song being played.
<cy>Only applies when using custom songs as the menu loop.</c>

songFormatNGML.name: Notifs: Song Name Format
songFormatNGML.description:
Choose the format you prefer for the "Now Playing" notification here.
<cy>Only applies when using Newgrounds/Music Library songs as the menu loop.</c>

customPrefix.name: Notifs: Prefix
customPrefix.description:
Set your prefix for the "Now Playing" notification here.

<cy>To disable the prefix, set it to </c><cl>"[Empty]"</c><cy>.</c>

notificationTime.name: Notifs: Duration
notificationTime.description: Adjust the time that the notification is on screen.

notificationFont.name: Notifs: Font
notificationFont.description:
Choose the font the notification will use. Default is 17 for legacy purposes.

<cj>0 for Pusab, -1 for Golden Pusab, and -2 for the font you see when viewing level comments.</c>
<cy>To use font numbers greater than 0: refer to the level editor for the font each number corresponds to, subtract that number by 1, and then put it here.</c>

randomizeWhenExitingLevel.name: Randomize on Level Exit
randomizeWhenExitingLevel.description:
Randomize the song when you exit a level.

<cy>This setting is ignored when "Playlist Mode" is enabled.</c>

randomizeWhenExitingEditor.name: Randomize on Editor Exit
randomizeWhenExitingEditor.description:
Randomize the song when you exit the editor.

<cy>This setting is ignored when "Playlist Mode" is enabled.</c>

specificSongOverride.name: Specific Menu Loop File Override
specificSongOverride.description:
Here in case you *hate* the randomizer elements from this mod.
<cy>Leave blank to disable.</c>

dangerousBlacklisting.name: Dangerous Blacklisting
dangerousBlacklisting.description:
<cl>Original idea by Aktimoose.</c>

Attempts to remove the lagspike when removing songs.

<c_>This is an experimental setting. You agree to hold yourself responsible for any issues that happen when this setting is enabled.</c>
